name: Santa Claus
overview: Santa Claus is shocked, as someone has stolen his sleigh. The sleigh is full of presents, and these will be thrown out of the sleigh. Santa has to collect all the presents, as his happiness else will decrease down to zero and the game will end. Santa can catch the presents in the air or from the bottom. If they are on the bottom too long they will explode and happiness will decrease. Every present Santa collects gives 10 points.
